body: A local noble wants to elope with one of your dancers. If you give permission for this, attempt a Diplomacy check and (whether you succeed or fail) multiply the result × 5 gp to determine your profits in terms of bribes and jewelry. If you refuse, you must succeed at a DC 20 Diplomacy or Intimidate check to avoid losing 1d3 points of Influence and 1 point of Labor.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Dance Hall Events/Hearts Desire
name: Heart's Desire
